revisions.rev: Transphobia, by analogy with [[homophobia]], is an irrational fear or hatred, or in some cases just disapproval, of [[transgender]] and [[transsexual]] people. Transphobia can have consequences as severe as homophobia for the targeted person. Transgender people are often targets of [[harassment]], [[assault]], and [[murder]], ranging from random attacks to [[rescue worker]]s who discover a transgendered accident victim's [[birth gender]] and withhold service until the person dies. Although the word transphobia is widely used, the phenomenon is more of a [[paranoia]] than a [[phobia]]. Two noted victims of transphobia were [[Brandon Teena]] and [[Gwen Araujo]]. See [[gay-bashing]].
